entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
